result.title: spoj longest palindromic substring
result.content:
hello everyone, i am trying to solve this problem using manacher algo http://www.spoj.com/problems/LPS/

but no matter how hard i try i always get wrong answer. i used many implementation of manacher from different sites but i stil get wrong answer always. i got the same problem accepts in hash. i want to know does anybody solve it with manacher algo?
